kv1.6:1.27: Sabbamatthīti yā diṭṭhi sā diṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhīti, yā diṭṭhi sā diṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhīti, hevamatthīti?
kv1.6:2.3: Nanu atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ atthaṅgataṃ abbhatthaṅgatanti?
kv1.6:2.5: Hañci atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ atthaṅgataṃ abbhatthaṅgataṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.6:3.3: Nanu anāgataṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asañjātaṃ anibbattaṃ anabhinibbattaṃ apātubhūtanti?
kv1.6:3.5: Hañci anāgataṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asañjātaṃ anibbattaṃ anabhinibbattaṃ apātubhūtaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.6:4.1: ☑ Paccuppannaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ aniruddhaṃ avigataṃ avipariṇataṃ na atthaṅgataṃ na abbhatthaṅgatanti?
kv1.6:4.3: Atītaṃ atthi atītaṃ aniruddhaṃ avigataṃ avipariṇataṃ na atthaṅgataṃ na abbhatthaṅgatanti?
kv1.6:4.5: paccuppannaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ sañjātaṃ nibbattaṃ abhinibbattaṃ pātubhūtanti?
kv1.6:4.7: Anāgataṃ atthi anāgataṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ sañjātaṃ nibbattaṃ abhinibbattaṃ pātubhūtanti?

kv1.6:5.3: Paccuppannaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ atthaṅgataṃ abbhatthaṅgatanti?
kv1.6:5.5: anāgataṃ atthi anāgataṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asañjātaṃ anibbattaṃ anabhinibbattaṃ apātubhūtanti?
kv1.6:5.7: Paccuppannaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asañjātaṃ anibbattaṃ anabhinibbattaṃ apātubhūtanti?

kv1.6:6.6: abbhatthaṅgataṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:7.6: apātubhūtaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:18.1: ☑ “Paccuppannan”ti vā “rūpan”ti vā, “rūpan”ti vā “paccuppannan”ti vā paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ appiyaṃ karitvā esese ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāteti?
kv1.6:19.1: ☑ “Paccuppannan”ti vā “rūpan”ti vā, “rūpan”ti vā “paccuppannan”ti vā paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ appiyaṃ karitvā esese ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāteti?
kv1.6:19.3: Paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ rūpabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?
kv1.6:20.1: ☒ “Odātan”ti vā “vatthan”ti vā, “vatthan”ti vā “odātan”ti vā odātaṃ vatthaṃ appiyaṃ karitvā esese ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāteti?
kv1.6:21.1: ☒ “Odātan”ti vā “vatthan”ti vā, “vatthan”ti vā “odātan”ti vā odātaṃ vatthaṃ appiyaṃ karitvā esese ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāteti?
kv1.6:21.3: Odātaṃ vatthaṃ rajjamānaṃ vatthabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?
kv1.6:22.5: Nanu rūpaṃ rūpabhāvaṃ na jahatīti rūpaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?
kv1.6:22.7: Hañci rūpaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.6:23.1: ☑ Nibbānaṃ nibbānabhāvaṃ na jahatīti nibbānaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti?
kv1.6:23.3: Rūpaṃ rūpabhāvaṃ na jahatīti rūpaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti?
kv1.6:23.5: rūpaṃ rūpabhāvaṃ na jahati rūpaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?
kv1.6:23.7: Nibbānaṃ nibbānabhāvaṃ na jahati nibbānaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?
kv1.6:24.1: ☑ Atītaṃ atthi atītaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?
kv1.6:24.3: Anāgataṃ atthi anāgataṃ anāgatabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?
kv1.6:24.5: Atītaṃ atthi atītaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?
kv1.6:24.7: Paccuppannaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ paccuppannabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:33.8: vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:40.1: ☑ Nibbānaṃ atthi nibbānaṃ nibbānabhāvaṃ na jahati nibbānaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti?
kv1.6:40.3: Atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahati atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti?
kv1.6:41.1: ☑ Atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahati atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?
kv1.6:41.3: Nibbānaṃ atthi nibbānaṃ nibbānabhāvaṃ na jahati nibbānaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?
kv1.6:42.3: Hañci atītaṃ nvatthi, atītaṃ atthīti micchā.
kv1.6:42.4: Hañci vā pana atthi nvātītaṃ, atthi atītanti micchā.
kv1.6:42.7: Hañci anāgataṃ nvatthi, anāgataṃ atthīti micchā.
kv1.6:42.8: Hañci vā pana atthi nvānāgataṃ, atthi anāgatanti micchā.

kv1.6:44.11: Na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti?

kv1.6:46.9: atītaṃ ghānaṃ atthi gandhā atthi ghānaviññāṇaṃ atthi vāyo atthi manasikāro atthīti?
kv1.6:46.13: atītā jivhā atthi rasā atthi jivhāviññāṇaṃ atthi āpo atthi manasikāro atthīti?
kv1.6:46.17: atīto kāyo atthi phoṭṭhabbā atthi kāyaviññāṇaṃ atthi pathavī atthi manasikāro atthīti?
kv1.6:46.21: atīto mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthīti?

kv1.6:48.1: ☑ Paccuppannaṃ cakkhuṃ atthi rūpā atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atthi āloko atthi manasikāro atthi, paccuppannena cakkhunā paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?
kv1.6:48.3: Atītaṃ cakkhuṃ atthi rūpā atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atthi āloko atthi manasikāro atthi, atītena cakkhunā atītaṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?
kv1.6:48.9: mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthi, paccuppannena manena paccuppannaṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?
kv1.6:48.11: Atīto mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthi, atītena manena atītaṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?
kv1.6:49.1: ☑ Paccuppannaṃ cakkhuṃ atthi rūpā atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atthi āloko atthi manasikāro atthi, paccuppannena cakkhunā paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?
kv1.6:49.3: Anāgataṃ cakkhuṃ atthi rūpā atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atthi āloko atthi manasikāro atthi, anāgatena cakkhunā anāgataṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?
kv1.6:49.9: mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthi, paccuppannena manena paccuppannaṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?
kv1.6:49.11: Anāgato mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthi, anāgatena manena anāgataṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?
kv1.6:50.1: ☑ Atītaṃ cakkhuṃ atthi rūpā atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atthi āloko atthi manasikāro atthi, na ca atītena cakkhunā atītaṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?

kv1.6:54.5: paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv1.6:54.7: Atītaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv1.6:54.9: paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv1.6:54.11: Anāgataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv1.6:54.13: paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv1.6:54.15: Anāgataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv1.6:55.1: ☑ Atītaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv1.6:55.3: Paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv1.6:55.5: atītaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv1.6:55.7: Paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv1.6:56.1: ☑ Anāgataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv1.6:56.3: Paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv1.6:56.5: Anāgataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv1.6:56.7: Paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv1.6:61.1: ☑ Puthujjanassa atīto rāgo atthi, puthujjano tena rāgena sarāgoti?
kv1.6:61.3: Arahato atīto rāgo atthi, arahā tena rāgena sarāgoti?
kv1.6:61.6: atītaṃ anottappaṃ atthi puthujjano tena anottappena anottappīti?
kv1.6:61.8: Arahato atītaṃ anottappaṃ atthi, arahā tena anottappena anottappīti?
kv1.6:62.1: ☑ Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:62.3: Anāgāmissa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, anāgāmī tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:62.6: atīto aṇusahagato byāpādo atthi, puthujjano tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:62.8: Anāgāmissa atīto aṇusahagato byāpādo atthi, anāgāmī tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:63.1: ☑ Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:63.3: Sakadāgāmissa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, sakadāgāmī tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:63.6: atīto oḷāriko byāpādo atthi, puthujjano tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:63.8: Sakadāgāmissa atīto oḷāriko byāpādo atthi, sakadāgāmī tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:64.1: ☑ Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:64.3: Sotāpannassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, sotāpanno tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:64.6: atīto apāyagamanīyo moho atthi, puthujjano tena mohena samohoti?
kv1.6:64.8: Sotāpannassa atīto apāyagamanīyo moho atthi, sotāpanno tena mohena samohoti?
kv1.6:65.1: ☑ Arahato atīto rāgo atthi, na ca arahā tena rāgena sarāgoti?
kv1.6:65.3: Puthujjanassa atīto rāgo atthi, na ca puthujjano tena rāgena sarāgoti?
kv1.6:65.6: atītaṃ anottappaṃ atthi, na ca arahā tena anottappena anottappīti?
kv1.6:65.8: Puthujjanassa atītaṃ anottappaṃ atthi, na ca puthujjano tena anottappena anottappīti?
kv1.6:66.1: ☑ Anāgāmissa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca anāgāmī tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:66.3: Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:66.6: atīto aṇusahagato byāpādo atthi, na ca anāgāmī tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:66.8: Puthujjanassa atīto aṇusahagato byāpādo atthi, na ca puthujjano tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:67.1: ☑ Sakadāgāmissa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca sakadāgāmī tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:67.3: Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:67.6: atīto oḷāriko byāpādo atthi, na ca sakadāgāmī tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:67.8: Puthujjanassa atīto oḷāriko byāpādo atthi, na ca puthujjano tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:68.1: ☑ Sotāpannassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca sotāpanno tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:68.3: Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:68.6: atīto apāyagamanīyo moho atthi, na ca sotāpanno tena mohena samohoti?
kv1.6:68.8: Puthujjanassa atīto apāyagamanīyo moho atthi, na ca puthujjano tena mohena samohoti?
kv1.6:69.15: Atītasmiṃ kucchismiṃ sati jighacchā pipāsā paññāyatīti?
kv1.6:70.3: Atīto kāyo paggahaniggahupago chedanabhedanupago kākehi gijjhehi kulalehi sādhāraṇoti?
kv1.6:70.5: atīte kāye visaṃ kameyya, satthaṃ kameyya, aggi kameyyāti?
kv1.6:70.7: labbhā atīto kāyo addubandhanena bandhituṃ, rajjubandhanena bandhituṃ, saṅkhalikabandhanena bandhituṃ, gāmabandhanena bandhituṃ, nigamabandhanena bandhituṃ, nagarabandhanena bandhituṃ, janapadabandhanena bandhituṃ, kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi bandhitunti?
kv1.6:72.1: ☑ Atīto rūpakkhandho atthi, anāgato rūpakkhandho atthi, paccuppanno rūpakkhandho atthīti?
kv1.6:72.5: atītā pañcakkhandhā atthi, anāgatā pañcakkhandhā atthi, paccuppannā pañcakkhandhā atthīti?
kv1.6:73.1: ☑ Atītaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ atthi, anāgataṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ atthi, paccuppannaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ atthīti?
kv1.6:73.5: atītāni dvādasāyatanāni atthi, anāgatāni dvādasāyatanāni atthi, paccuppannāni dvādasāyatanāni atthīti?
kv1.6:74.1: ☑ Atītā cakkhudhātu atthi, anāgatā cakkhudhātu atthi, paccuppannā cakkhudhātu atthīti?
kv1.6:74.5: atītā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo atthi, anāgatā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo atthi, paccuppannā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo atthīti?
kv1.6:75.1: ☑ Atītaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ atthi, anāgataṃ cakkhundriyaṃ atthi, paccuppannaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ atthīti?
kv1.6:75.5: atītāni bāvīsatindriyāni atthi, anāgatāni bāvīsatindriyāni atthi, paccuppannāni bāvīsatindriyāni atthīti?
kv1.6:76.1: ☑ Atīto rājā cakkavattī atthi, anāgato rājā cakkavattī atthi, paccuppanno rājā cakkavattī atthīti?
kv1.6:77.1: ☑ Atīto sammāsambuddho atthi, anāgato sammāsambuddho atthi, paccuppanno sammāsambuddho atthīti?
kv1.6:79.2: Hañci atītaṃ atthi, atthi siyā atītaṃ, siyā nvātītaṃ, tenātītaṃ nvātītaṃ, nvātītaṃ atītanti.
kv1.6:79.5: ‘atītaṃ atthi atthi siyā atītaṃ, siyā nvātītaṃ, tenātītaṃ nvātītaṃ, nvātītaṃ atītan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:80.1: No ce pana atītaṃ nvātītaṃ nvātītaṃ atītanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.6:80.2: “atītaṃ atthi atthi siyā atītaṃ, siyā nvātītan”ti.
kv1.6:80.5: ‘atītaṃ atthi atthi siyā atītaṃ, siyā nvātītaṃ, tenātītaṃ nvātītaṃ, nvātītaṃ atītan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:82.2: Hañci anāgataṃ atthi atthi siyā anāgataṃ siyā nvānāgataṃ, tenānāgataṃ nvānāgataṃ, nvānāgataṃ anāgatanti.
kv1.6:82.5: ‘anāgataṃ atthi atthi siyā anāgataṃ, siyā nvānāgataṃ, tenānāgataṃ nvānāgataṃ, nvānāgataṃ anāgatan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:83.1: No ce panānāgataṃ nvānāgataṃ nvānāgataṃ anāgatanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.6:83.2: “anāgataṃ atthi atthi siyā anāgataṃ, siyā nvānāgatan”ti.
kv1.6:83.5: ‘anāgataṃ atthi atthi siyā anāgataṃ, siyā nvānāgataṃ, tenānāgataṃ nvānāgataṃ, nvānāgataṃ anāgatan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:84.4: Atthi siyā paccuppannaṃ, siyā no paccuppannanti.
kv1.6:85.2: Hañci paccuppannaṃ atthi atthi siyā paccuppannaṃ, siyā no paccuppannaṃ, tena paccuppannaṃ, no paccuppannaṃ, no paccuppannaṃ paccuppannanti.
kv1.6:85.5: ‘paccuppannaṃ atthi atthi siyā paccuppannaṃ, siyā no paccuppannaṃ, tena paccuppannaṃ no paccuppannaṃ, no paccuppannaṃ paccuppannan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:86.1: No ce pana paccuppannaṃ no paccuppannaṃ, no paccuppannaṃ paccuppannanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.6:86.2: “paccuppannaṃ atthi atthi siyā paccuppannaṃ, siyā no paccuppannan”ti.
kv1.6:86.5: ‘paccuppannaṃ atthi atthi siyā paccuppannaṃ, siyā no paccuppannaṃ, tena paccuppannaṃ no paccuppannaṃ, no paccuppannaṃ paccuppannan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:87.4: Atthi siyā nibbānaṃ siyā no nibbānanti.
kv1.6:88.2: Hañci nibbānaṃ atthi atthi siyā nibbānaṃ, siyā no nibbānaṃ, tena nibbānaṃ no nibbānaṃ, no nibbānaṃ nibbānanti.
kv1.6:88.5: ‘nibbānaṃ atthi atthi siyā nibbānaṃ, siyā no nibbānaṃ, tena nibbānaṃ no nibbānaṃ, no nibbānaṃ nibbānan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:89.1: No ce pana nibbānaṃ no nibbānaṃ, no nibbānaṃ nibbānanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.6:89.2: “nibbānaṃ atthi atthi siyā nibbānaṃ, siyā no nibbānan”ti.
kv1.6:89.5: ‘nibbānaṃ atthi atthi siyā nibbānaṃ, siyā no nibbānaṃ, tena nibbānaṃ no nibbānaṃ, no nibbānaṃ nibbānan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:90.5: “yaṃ kiñci, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā—
kv1.6:90.10: yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā—
kv1.6:90.14: Tena hi atītaṃ atthi, anāgataṃ atthīti.
kv1.6:91.4: “tayome, bhikkhave, niruttipathā adhivacanapathā paññattipathā asaṃkiṇṇā asaṃkiṇṇapubbā na saṃkiyanti na saṅkiyissanti appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
kv1.6:91.6: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ ‘ahosī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa paññatti;
kv1.6:91.7: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
kv1.6:91.11: yaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ ‘ahosī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa paññatti;
kv1.6:91.12: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
kv1.6:92.1: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ ajātaṃ apātubhūtaṃ ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa paññatti;
kv1.6:92.2: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti.
kv1.6:92.6: yaṃ viññāṇaṃ ajātaṃ apātubhūtaṃ ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa paññatti;
kv1.6:92.7: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti.
kv1.6:93.1: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ jātaṃ pātubhūtaṃ ‘atthī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘atthī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘atthī’ti tassa paññatti;
kv1.6:93.2: na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
kv1.6:93.6: yaṃ viññāṇaṃ jātaṃ pātubhūtaṃ ‘atthī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘atthī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘atthī’ti tassa paññatti;
kv1.6:93.7: na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
kv1.6:93.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo niruttipathā adhivacanapathā paññattipathā asaṃkiṇṇā asaṃkiṇṇapubbā na saṃkiyanti na saṅkiyissanti appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
kv1.6:94.1: Yepi te, bhikkhave, ahesuṃ ukkalā vassabhaññā ahetukavādā akiriyavādā natthikavādā, tepime tayo niruttipathe adhivacanapathe paññattipathe na garahitabbaṃ na paṭikkositabbaṃ amaññiṃsu.
kv1.6:95.4: “atthi nu kho taṃ, bhante, cakkhuṃ yena cakkhunā atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte paññāpayamāno paññāpeyyāti.
kv1.6:95.5: Atthi nu kho sā, bhante, jivhā …pe…
kv1.6:95.6: atthi nu kho so, bhante, mano yena manena atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte paññāpayamāno paññāpeyyā”ti.
kv1.6:96.1: “Natthi kho taṃ, phagguna, cakkhuṃ yena cakkhunā atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya.
kv1.6:96.3: natthi nu kho so, phagguna, mano yena manena atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte paññāpayamāno paññāpeyyā”ti.
kv1.6:97.4: “ahu pubbe lobho tadahu akusalaṃ, so etarahi natthi, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
kv1.6:97.6: ahu pubbe moho, tadahu akusalaṃ, so etarahi natthi, iccetaṃ kusalan”ti.
kv1.6:98.5: “kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo, atthi nandī, atthi taṇhā;
kv1.6:98.7: Yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ viññāṇaṃ virūḷhaṃ, atthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
kv1.6:98.8: Yattha atthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi.
kv1.6:98.9: Yattha atthi saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi, atthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
kv1.6:98.10: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, atthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ.
kv1.6:98.11: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ, sasokaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, sarajaṃ saupāyāsanti vadāmi.
kv1.6:99.3: viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo, atthi nandī …pe…
kv1.6:100.4: “kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre natthi rāgo, natthi nandī, natthi taṇhā;
kv1.6:100.6: Yattha viññāṇaṃ appatiṭṭhitaṃ avirūḷhaṃ, natthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
kv1.6:100.7: Yattha natthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, natthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi.
kv1.6:100.8: Yattha natthi saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi, natthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
kv1.6:100.9: Yattha natthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, natthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ.
kv1.6:100.10: Yattha natthi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ, asokaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, arajaṃ anupāyāsanti vadāmi.
kv1.6:101.3: viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre natthi rāgo, natthi nandī …pe…
